dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9547 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 120 Doty Street in Kaukauna, Wisconsin, as the “Sgt. Nickolas Mueller Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gallagher (for himself, Mr. Steil, Mr. Pocan, Mr. Kind, Ms. Moore of Wisconsin, Mr. Fitzgerald, Mr. Grothman, and Mr. Tiffany) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 120 Doty Street in Kaukauna, Wisconsin, as the Sgt. Nickolas Mueller Post Office Building.

section.header: Sgt. Nickolas Mueller Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 120 Doty Street in Kaukauna, Wisconsin, shall be known and designated as the Sgt. Nickolas Mueller Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Sgt. Nickolas Mueller Post Office Building.
